title: Locale Manifest
description: Schema for localization manifest.json - single source of truth for supported locales and namespaces (Localization Manifest Spec v1)

reference.description: Reference locale code (e.g., 'en', 'en-US'). All other locales must match this locale's keys.

locales.description: List of supported locale codes. Must include the reference locale.

namespaces.description: Required namespaces that must exist for all locales (e.g., 'common', 'ui', 'errors')

optional_namespaces.description: Optional namespaces that may not exist for all locales. If present, must match reference keys.
